original: Theravāda Vinaya
analyzed: thera vāda vinaya

original: Mahāvibhaṅga
analyzed: mahāvibhaṅga

original: Pāṭidesanīyakaṇḍa
analyzed: pāṭidesanīya kaṇḍa

original: 3. Tatiyapāṭidesanīyasikkhāpada
Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṁ aññataraṁ kulaṁ ubhatopasannaṁ hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyam aññataram kulam ubhatas upasannam hoti

original: Saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati, yaṁ tasmiṁ kule uppajjati purebhattaṁ khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā taṁ sabbaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vissajjetvā appekadā anasitā acchanti.
analyzed: saddhāya vaḍḍhati bhogena hāyati yam tasmim kule uppajjati purebhattam khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā tam sabbam bhikkhūnam vissajjetvā appekadā an asitāḥ acchanti

original: Manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: manussāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā na mattaṁ jānitvā paṭiggahessanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇāḥ sakyaputtiyāḥ na mattam jānitvā paṭiggahessanti

original: Ime imesaṁ datvā appekadā anasitā acchantī”ti.
analyzed: ime da tvāḥ appekadāḥ an asitāḥ acchanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṁ kulaṁ saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati evarūpassa kulassa ñattidutiyena kammena sekkhasammutiṁ dātuṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave yam kulam saddhāya vaḍḍhati bhogena hāyati evarūpassa kulassa ñatti dutiyena kammena sekkha sammutim dātu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, dātabbā.
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave dātabbā

original: Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
analyzed: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅghaḥ ñāpetabbaḥ

original: ‘Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho.
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ

original: Itthannāmaṁ kulaṁ saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati.
analyzed: itthannāmam kulam saddhāya vaḍḍhati bhogena hāyati

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmassa kulassa sekkhasammutiṁ dadeyya.
analyzed: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla saṅghaḥ itthannāmassa kulassa sekkha sammutim dadeyya

original: Esā ñatti.
analyzed: esā ñatti

original: Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho.
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ

original: Itthannāmaṁ kulaṁ saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati.
analyzed: itthannāmam kulam saddhāya vaḍḍhati bhogena hāyati

original: Saṅgho itthannāmassa kulassa sekkhasammutiṁ deti.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ itthannāmassa kulassa sekkha sammutim deti

original: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa kulassa sekkhasammutiyā dānaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayasmataḥ khamati itthannāmassa kulassa sekkha sammutiyā so tuṇhassa

original: yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
analyzed: yassa na khamati saḥ bhāseyya

original: Dinnā saṅghena itthannāmassa kulassa sekkhasammuti.
analyzed: dinnā saṅghena itthannāmassa kulassa sekkha sammuti

original: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
analyzed: khamati saṅghassa tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu
analyzed: yāni kho pana tāni sekkha sammatāni kulāni yaḥ pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkha sammatesu

original: kulesu khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā,
analyzed: kulesu khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā

original: paṭidesetabbaṁ tena bhikkhunā—
analyzed: paṭidesetabbam tena bhikkhunā

original: ‘gārayhaṁ, āvuso, dhammaṁ āpajjiṁ asappāyaṁ pāṭidesanīyaṁ taṁ paṭidesemī’”ti.
analyzed: gārayhaḥ āvuso dhammaṃ āpajjim asappāyam pāṭidesanīyam tam paṭidesemi iti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṁ ussavo hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyam ussavaḥ hoti

original: Manussā bhikkhū nimantetvā bhojenti.
analyzed: manussāḥ bhikkhū nimantetvā bhojenti

original: Tampi kho kulaṁ bhikkhū nimantesi.
analyzed: tam pi kho kulam bhikkhū nimantesi

original: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā nādhivāsenti—
analyzed: bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na adhivāsenti

original: “paṭikkhittaṁ bhagavatā sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādituṁ bhuñjitun”ti.
analyzed: paṭikkhittam bhagavatā sekkha sammatesu kulesu khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāditum bhuñjitum ti

original: Te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kiṁ nu kho nāma amhākaṁ jīvitena yaṁ ayyā amhākaṁ na paṭiggaṇhantī”ti.
analyzed: kim nu kho nāma amhākam jīvitena yam ayyāḥ amhākam na paṭiggaṇhanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, nimantitena sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādituṁ bhuñjituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave nimantitena sekkha sammatesu kulesu khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāditum bhuñjitu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu
analyzed: yāni kho pana tāni sekkha sammatāni kulāni yaḥ pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkha sammatesu

original: kulesu pubbe animantito khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya
analyzed: kulesu pubbe a nimantitaḥ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya

original: vā bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṁ tena bhikkhunā—
analyzed: vā bhuñjeyya vā paṭidesetabbam tena bhikkhunā

original: ‘gārayhaṁ, āvuso, dhammaṁ āpajjiṁ asappāyaṁ pāṭidesanīyaṁ, taṁ paṭidesemī’”ti.
analyzed: gārayhaḥ āvuso dhammaṃ āpajjim asappāyam tam paṭidesemi iti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu tassa kulassa kulūpako hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññataraḥ bhikkhu tassa kulassa kulūpakaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena taṁ kulaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena tam kulam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena saḥ bhikkhu gilānaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho te manussā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho te manussāḥ tam bhikkhum etat avocu

original: “bhuñjatha, bhante”ti.
analyzed: bhuñjatha bhanta iti

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu—
analyzed: atha kho so bhikkhu

original: “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṁ animantitena sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādituṁ bhuñjitun”ti kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesi;
analyzed: bhagavatā paṭikkhittam a nimantitena sekkha sammatesu kulesu khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāditum bhuñjitum ti kukkuccāyantaḥ na paṭiggahesi

original: nāsakkhi piṇḍāya carituṁ;
analyzed: na asakkhi piṇḍāya caritu

original: chinnabhatto ahosi.
analyzed: chinna bhattaḥ ahosi

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu ārāmam gantvā bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesi

original: Bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhū bhagavato etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādituṁ bhuñjituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave gilānena bhikkhunā sekkha sammatesu kulesu khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāditum bhuñjitu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu
analyzed: yāni kho pana tāni sekkha sammatāni kulāni yaḥ pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkha sammatesu

original: kulesu pubbe animantito agilāno khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā
analyzed: kulesu pubbe a nimantitaḥ a gilānaḥ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā

original: khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṁ tena bhikkhunā—
analyzed: khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā paṭidesetabbam tena bhikkhunā

original: ‘gārayhaṁ, āvuso, dhammaṁ āpajjiṁ asappāyaṁ pāṭidesanīyaṁ, taṁ paṭidesemī’”ti.
analyzed: gārayhaḥ āvuso dhammaṃ āpajjim asappāyam tam paṭidesemi iti

original: Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulānīti
analyzed: yāni kho pana tāni sekkha sammatāni kulāni iti

original: sekkhasammataṁ nāma kulaṁ yaṁ kulaṁ saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati. Evarūpassa kulassa ñattidutiyena kammena sekkhasammuti dinnā hoti.
analyzed: sekkhasammatam nāma kulam yam kulam saddhāya vaḍḍhati bhogena hāyati evarūpassa kulassa ñatti dutiyena kammena sekkha sammuti dinnā hoti
